sense.name: A person or thing equal to another in value or significane.
sense.examples: She is the equivalent of any man on the team. The two kinds of problems are equivalents of one another. Send two dollars or the equivalent in stamps.

sense.name: (science) The atomic weight of an element that has the same combining capacity as a given weight of another element.
sense.commentary: Note: Use only for this specific science meaning. EQUIVALENT[+computer_science]
sense.examples: The equivalent is 8 for oxygen. We must find the equivalent in hydrogen.
